fields.Title: TRIBUNAL / THIRD GUY?
fields.Description: "Hey, who is this third guy? I didn't know there was three of you!"

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""... all of you fucking cunts insid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... all of you fucking cunts inside out..."

fields.Title: You: "Count the figures."
fields.Dialogue Text: Count the figures.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Now! Now is the time! Stop waiting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now! Now is the time! Stop waiting.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""That's right." He stares at you wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right." He stares at you with watery eyes. "Plenty of kipts here in Revachol too."

fields.Title: Logic: "The two little *white* figures in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The two little *white* figures in the end are from when they moved to Revachol. They're recent.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Now! Now is the time! Stop waiting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now! Now is the time! Stop waiting.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "He has chewed his lips bloody."
fields.Dialogue Text: He has chewed his lips bloody.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Let's just keep talking -- n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Let's just keep talking -- no one needs to die today." (Back off.)
fields.Alternate1: "Okay. Let's just keep talking -- no one needs to die today." (Back off.)
fields.Alternate2: "Okay. Let's just keep talking -- no one needs to die tonight." (Back off.)
fields.Alternate3: "Okay. Let's just keep talking -- no one needs to die this night." (Back off.)

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""The gunner." He gestures toward hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The gunner." He gestures toward himself. "The radist." He nods towards the woman. "The killer." He points to the figure clad entirely in ceramic plate.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""This... talking-shit won't help yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This... talking-shit won't help you." The man shakes his head and staggers forward.

fields.Title: You: ""Kills black people?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kills black people?"

fields.Title: You: ""The *Killer*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *Killer*?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "That struck some chord -- a dark ch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That struck some chord -- a dark chord.

fields.Title: De Paule: ""Oh yeah, that's Ruud." The armoure..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah, that's Ruud." The armoured woman smiles a vicious smile. "Ruud 'The Killer' Hoenkloewen -- he doesn't talk much."

fields.Title: Volition: "Easy. Easy now."
fields.Dialogue Text: Easy. Easy now.

fields.Title: Eugene: ""T, let's fucking *do* it," the man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "T, let's fucking *do* it," the man presses through his teeth -- his hand is on his belt.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Gene...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gene..."

fields.Title: You: ""Uh... tends to the stables?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh... tends to the stables?"

fields.Title: You: ""He kills?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He kills?"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You're a tit-sucking pig..." He st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a tit-sucking pig..." He staggers forward: "I'm gonna show you killer."

fields.Title: Volition: "Easy. Easy now."
fields.Dialogue Text: Easy. Easy now.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Huh?" He just stares at you with h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh?" He just stares at you with his watery eyes.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "These men served in Semenine... the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These men served in Semenine... the native islanders...

fields.Title: You: ""You think you're real tough, huh?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think you're real tough, huh? This killing is meaningless."

fields.Title: You: ""Good -- I *kill* killers." (Point..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good -- I *kill* killers." (Point to your chest.)

fields.Title: Authority: "He is not used to commanding, or le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is not used to commanding, or leading. He feels uncomfortable. He'd rather shoot to kill...

fields.Title: De Paule: ""What are we waiting for?! Let's bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are we waiting for?! Let's blow that pig-fucking mouth off his face!"

fields.Title: You: ""What was that, Ruud?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was that, Ruud?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Perhaps it's for the best. Him not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps it's for the best. Him not talking *too* much.

fields.Title: Composure: "This man has been under severe emot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This man has been under severe emotional pressure recently.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "About *fifty* little stick figures..."
fields.Dialogue Text: About *fifty* little stick figures -- all of them black. Plus two little white ones in the end.

fields.Title: The Gardener: "She has fallen silent."
fields.Dialogue Text: She has fallen silent.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Smart loincloth." He stares at you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Smart loincloth." He stares at you with his watery eyes. "He fucks natives up. Soldier of the Apocalypse-style."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Lance-corporal..." He turns to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lance-corporal..." He turns to the woman. "Just fucking shut up and wait for your order."

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""... rip you open...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "... rip you open..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Authority: "He is not used to commanding, or le..."]
Kortenaer: ""Not today, Ruud. That'll be *me* t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not today, Ruud. That'll be *me* today..." He looks at the woman on the plaza floor.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Hold your fire!" He licks his lips..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold your fire!" He licks his lips. "Wait for my command."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a killer too.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a killer too."

fields.Title: De Paule: ""What are we waiting for?" She turn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are we waiting for?" She turns to the leader. "Let's blow that big fucking mouth off his face!"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""What do you think he *does?*""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think he *does?*"

fields.Title: De Paule: ""Ruud? Ruud is the killer --" The a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ruud? Ruud is the killer --" The armoured woman smiles a vicious smile. "Ruud 'The Killer' Hoenkloewen -- he doesn't talk much."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "There -- on the rim of Hoenkloewen'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There -- on the rim of Hoenkloewen's helmet -- you count little stick figures: 19, 20, 21...

fields.Title: Half Light: "Now! Now is the time! Stop waiting."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now! Now is the time! Stop waiting.

fields.Title: Volition: "Easy. Easy now."
fields.Dialogue Text: Easy. Easy now.
